thread.title: Gautrain

author: news24.com
title: Gautrain
text:
I have been catching the Gautrain for 2 years now.
I find it efficient and fast. It is most convenient..
It gets you to your destination in record time..Without the hassle of traffic.
It is really like the facebook. I have met so many people.
You can strike up a conversations with just about anybody. I have met some interesting people. Made some friends as well.
You don't have too chat all the time. You can do anything to pass the time away. Read a book for instance.
Try the Gautrain out..
You will be surprised how you will enjoy it..
Gail Shorkend
